result.title: Submission times: server time zone vs local time zone
result.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm not sure if this has been discussed before, but here we go:

As you all may know, Codeforces started showing times in the user's local time zones quite a while ago. However, I noticed that in the user submission pages, submission times are still shown in server time zone. As a result, I have gotten a bit confused at times. Is there any specific reason for why this is so? Thank you for your attention!
